Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: a wooden bridge

A wooden bridge spans the width of the stream flowing to the southeast through the otherwise thickly treed forest. The waters run fast and high, bloated by springtime melt. The sun pierces through the canopy of verdant new leaves to dance over the waters with glittering light.The surface of the steam glitters with the pale glow of the moon that pierces the canopy of new leaves. The water bubbles onward, slow and lazy in the heat of the summer season. Sunlight filters through the canopy of thick leaves to sparkle on the brook.The night cloaks the area in thick darkness, the heavy foliage above barely allowing any light to infuse the area. Fallen leaves of red, orange, yellow and brown cling to the banks of the babbling brook. The thinning canopy of autumnal leaves permit a golden rosy light to wash over the waters.Starlight and moonglow sneak through the thinning canopy of autumn leaves, glittering over the surface of the waters. Small bits of ice cling to the banks of the brook, occasionally breaking off to travel downstream. The sun floods through the bare branches of the canopy above but the light does little to free the air from the chill of winter.Starlight glitters through the leafless branches above, twinkling in reflection off the surface of the icy waters.

{? | $(this.details:exit-northeast:exit:door) | the $[($this."details:exit-northeast:exit:directions"[0])] door {? | $[NRefOb($this."details:exit-northeast:exit:dest")."trait:buildingname"] | leading into $[NRefOb($this."details:exit-northeast:exit:dest")."trait:buildingname"] } | $[Describe(NRefOb($this."details:exit-northeast:exit:dest"))] to the northeast }

{? | $(this.details:exit-southwest:exit:door) | the $[($this."details:exit-southwest:exit:directions"[0])] door {? | $[NRefOb($this."details:exit-southwest:exit:dest")."trait:buildingname"] | leading into $[NRefOb($this."details:exit-southwest:exit:dest")."trait:buildingname"] } | $[Describe(NRefOb($this."details:exit-southwest:exit:dest"))] to the southwest }
the sloping northeastern bank
The northeastern bank slopes gently down towards the clear stream, with thick underbrush hampering the journey.
The northeastern bank slopes gently down towards the clear stream, with thick underbrush hampering the journey.
the sloping southwestern bank
The southwestern bank slopes gently down towards the clear stream, with thick underbrush hampering the journey.
The southwestern bank slopes gently down towards the clear stream, with thick underbrush hampering the journey.
the snow-dusted rain-speckled wooden slats of the bridge

The snow-dusted rain-speckled wooden slats of the bridge are fitted together over a supportive framework, allowing occasional glimpses through knots and minor gaps. Two even tracks run parallel along the length of the bridge suggesting at frequent usage.
The wooden slats of the bridge are fitted together over a supportive framework, allowing occasional glimpses through knots and minor gaps.
the bridge's wooden railing
A wooden railing spans the length of the bridge on either side, preventing travelers from falling into the stream below.
A wooden railing spans the length of the bridge on either side, preventing travelers from falling into the stream below.
the sporadic rocks and boulders
A myriad of rocks and boulders can be glimpsed above the surface of the clear stream, providing sporadic stepping stones across.
A myriad of rocks and boulders can be glimpsed above the surface of the clear stream, providing sporadic stepping stones across.
the thick underbrush
The thick underbrush covers the forest floor, hampering descent towards the clear stream down the sloping banks.
The thick underbrush covers the forest floor, hampering descent towards the clear stream down the sloping banks.
clear stream

A slow-moving stream with crystal clear water run from northwest to southeast beneath the wooden bridge. An occasional fish can be seen swimming within, with the occasional rock and boulder providing haphazard stepping stones across the water.
A slow-moving stream with crystal clear water run from northwest to southeast beneath the wooden bridge.
